fields.name: Kingsley Vale
fields.media: Oil painting on stretched canvas - 83 x 74 cm. Framed in neutral grey moulding.
fields.description: The Yew trees of Kingsley Vale are such wonderful examples of unpruned or managed trees, allowed to follow their natural form. Painted in great detail with a highly coloured palette.

fields.name: Geometric Web
fields.description: I am very pleased to introduce my design: Geometric Web. The Geometric Web is a hand thrown spherical vase with the application of extremely detailed slip-trailing to create an undulating spider’s web.

fields.name: The Ancient Chestnut In Stocklinch
fields.media: Oil Painting On Canvas - Framed- 62 cm x 62 cm
fields.description: This tree sits quietly in a corner of Stocklinch. A Pollarded Sweet Chestnut of great age and gnarled, with exquisit patterns.

fields.name: Night Wing
fields.media: Oil on board - 64 x 54 cm - Framed in black & gold
fields.description: A symmetrical design of moth wings with elaborate colours.

fields.name: The Autumn Herald
fields.media: Oil painting on stretched canvas - 56 x 56 cm - Framed in black
fields.description: Painted tesselating leaves surround a comma butterfly/mask. An autumn figure imbueing the season.

fields.name: The Green Man
fields.media: Oil painting on stretched canvas - 67 x 57 cm - Framed in black
fields.description: A richly painted picture of an ancient figure from the past and the message he may bring to the future.

fields.name: Journey Stone
fields.media: Sandstone inlaid with a mosaic design
fields.description: A carved mosaic design inlaid with mirror and glass pieces.

fields.name: West Bay Cliffs
fields.description: This picture of the Dorset coast is comprised of agrigate and flakes of stone gathered from the sight.

fields.name: Celtic Dragon
fields.description: These large towers are 17” high by 6” wide at the base and 4” wide at the top (all measurements are approximate).

fields.name: Celtic Bird
fields.description: The Celtic Bird small towers are limited to 9. The small tower measures 9 1/4 inches high, (all measurements are approximate).

fields.name: Wings Of Angels
fields.description: Symbolism and art create a wonderful blend of meaning and skill that artists convey in stunning ways. The Wings of Angels piece is a complex design incorporating the flow and beauty of peacock feathers with a stylised angel. The medium (approximately 7.5” high) pieces are limited editions of 7

fields.name: Battling Dragon and Octopus
fields.description: This piece is a limited edition of 5. The large towers are 17 inches high by 4 inches wide at the base. (all measurements are approximate).
